channel.title: Comments on: I Survived The 2009 Silver Spring Zombie Walk

item.title: By: Rosemary Agoy
item.dc:creator: Rosemary Agoy
item.description: Ha ha really even i didn't notice at the first time...good observation..interesting post.
item.content:encoded: Ha ha really even i didn’t notice at the first time…good observation..interesting post.

item.title: By: wanda
item.dc:creator: wanda
item.description:
Hi,
Is there any chance of getting the contact information for the artist that designed the poster?
Thank you
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Mike Licht
item.dc:creator: Mike Licht
item.description:
It's not a fad, it's a syndrome -- Zombie Behavior Spectrum Disorder, ZBSD
See:
http://notionscapital.wordpress.com/2009/10/30/seasonal-health-threat/

item.title: By: ThayerAvenue.com » 2009 Silver Spring Zombie Walk Media Roundup

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: Ha that's awesome. My fiance and I couldn't tell if she was older or if that was just a costume. That outfit was my fiance's favorite.
item.content:encoded: Ha that’s awesome. My fiance and I couldn’t tell if she was older or if that was just a costume. That outfit was my fiance’s favorite.

item.title: By: Stephen
item.dc:creator: Stephen
item.description: tha older zombie in red (middleish picture) is a Zom-Bea Arthur (in Dorothy guise), with a zombie Sophia behind her (from Golden Girls)
item.content:encoded: tha older zombie in red (middleish picture) is a Zom-Bea Arthur (in Dorothy guise), with a zombie Sophia behind her (from Golden Girls)
